  content: `
  ## Overview
  
  Freedom of Information (FOI) requests are essential for public accountability, yet managing them is often inefficient and time-consuming. **OpenFOI** is a lightweight, AI-powered platform designed to streamline the FOI lifecycle ‚Äî from drafting and redacting to exporting and tracking ‚Äî helping journalists, civil society groups, and government bodies reduce overhead and improve transparency.
  
  ## Features
  
  - üîç AI-assisted draft generation for FOI responses  
  - ‚úÇÔ∏è Smart redaction using named entity recognition (NER)  
  - üìÑ One-click export to PDF and CSV formats  
  - üìä Analytics dashboard for tracking request timelines and response rates  
  - üß† GPT-powered suggestions for common replies and flag detection  
  
  ## Technologies Used
  
  - **React** ‚Äì frontend UI  
  - **FastAPI** ‚Äì backend API  
  - **OpenAI (GPT-4)** ‚Äì language generation  
  - **PostgreSQL** ‚Äì data storage  
  - **spaCy** ‚Äì for redaction and NER  
  - **Git LFS** ‚Äì for media versioning  
  - **TailwindCSS** ‚Äì for clean and responsive UI  
  
  ## Reflections
  
  OpenFOI was developed to explore how AI can reduce the administrative burden associated with public sector transparency. Building it deepened my understanding of language models in sensitive domains, full-stack system design, and user workflows in civic tech. It‚Äôs a compelling use case for AI in service of democratic accountability.

sourcesContent:
const post = {
    id: "openFOI",
    title: "OpenFOI: Freedom of Information Made Easy",
    publication: "Portfolio, 2025",
    date: "2025-05-28",
    summary: "An AI-powered platform for managing Freedom of Information requests.",
    video: "/videos/OpenFOI.mp4",
    content: `
  ## Overview
  
  Freedom of Information (FOI) requests are essential for public accountability, yet managing them is often inefficient and time-consuming. **OpenFOI** is a lightweight, AI-powered platform designed to streamline the FOI lifecycle ‚Äî from drafting and redacting to exporting and tracking ‚Äî helping journalists, civil society groups, and government bodies reduce overhead and improve transparency.
  
  ## Features
  
  - üîç AI-assisted draft generation for FOI responses  
  - ‚úÇÔ∏è Smart redaction using named entity recognition (NER)  
  - üìÑ One-click export to PDF and CSV formats  
  - üìä Analytics dashboard for tracking request timelines and response rates  
  - üß† GPT-powered suggestions for common replies and flag detection  
  
  ## Technologies Used
  
  - **React** ‚Äì frontend UI  
  - **FastAPI** ‚Äì backend API  
  - **OpenAI (GPT-4)** ‚Äì language generation  
  - **PostgreSQL** ‚Äì data storage  
  - **spaCy** ‚Äì for redaction and NER  
  - **Git LFS** ‚Äì for media versioning  
  - **TailwindCSS** ‚Äì for clean and responsive UI  
  
  ## Reflections
  
  OpenFOI was developed to explore how AI can reduce the administrative burden associated with public sector transparency. Building it deepened my understanding of language models in sensitive domains, full-stack system design, and user workflows in civic tech. It‚Äôs a compelling use case for AI in service of democratic accountability.
  `
  };
  
  export default post;
